code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import Rating from'./Rating';var Product=function Product(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var overText={minHeight:"40px",display:"-webkit-box",WebkitLineClamp:"2",WebkitBoxOrient:"vertical",overflow:"hidden",textOverflow:"ellipsis"};var overImg={minHeight:"176px",position:"relative"};var imgInner={position:"absolute",top:"50%",left:"50%",transform:"translate(-50%, -50%)"};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded "},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),style:overImg},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Img,{src:product.image,variant:"top",style:imgInner})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Body,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Title,{as:"div",style:overText},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,product.name))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Text,{as:"div"},"Category: ",product.category),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Text,{as:"div"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:"".concat(product.numReviews," reviews")})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card.Text,{as:"h3"},"$",product.price)));};export default Product;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({ product }) => { const overText = { minHeight: "40px", display: "-webkit-box", WebkitLineClamp: "2", WebkitBoxOrient: "vertical", overflow: "hidden", textOverflow: "ellipsis", }; const overImg = { minHeight: "176px", position: "relative" } const imgInner = { position: "absolute", top: "50%", left: "50%", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)" } return ( {product.name} Category: {product.category} ${product.price} ) } export default Product
